website_summaries.verdict: A standard ice cube tray made with silicone bottoms for easy removal.
pros: 3 trays packs cost less than comparable molds
Silicone trays make it easy to pop ice cubes out

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to get these for a while now and finally did. I was afraid to because I wasn't sure they would work. I love these ice trays. They come with lids so you don't spill them and are stackable. My daughter loves that you just press the silicone on bottom and the ice pops right out. I will definetly be buying more of these next payday.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Combrink

customer_reviews.title: OMG these are amazing! I do not know why I haven't thought ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG these are amazing! I do not know why I haven't thought of this myself or used them before now. It saves so much time and energy and you never have to worry about knocking too many out of the tray again. Each one comes with a lid so it's easy to stack.You do have to do the normal twisting of the tray to loosen them a little bit. Each silicone bottom easily pushes the ice out of it's slot. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: A.Natalee

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: You’ll wonder why you didn’t get this years ago. I’ve cibes end up being a little small, and that’s the only con. The lid allows you to stack these as they freeze, saving valuable space. Punching out silicone bottoms is way easier, accurate, and more fun than cracking a hard piece of plastic and hoping for the best that they don’t all end up on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Neeko

customer_reviews.title: Great for someone with arthritis in their hands
customer_reviews.text: These ice trays are perfect! The rubber on the bottom comes up the sides quite a bit so it's not hard to push the ice out. I had another tray that just had rubber on the bottom and didn't have enough give to push the ice out unless I ran hot water over it first which is a pain. I'm so glad to have these now so that I can get the ice out with ease and I don't have to let it melt some in order to get it out. I have rheumatoid arthritis and this is so much easier on me. I love that they have lids and are dishwasher safe, too!
customer_reviews.author: loretta gentle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great for ice!
customer_reviews.text: I love these ice trays! The lids make a world of difference so water doesn’t spill all over your freezer. After the water solids up it’s super easy to pop the ice out into a tray because of the silicone backs that are flexible. I use these daily!!
customer_reviews.author: AuntGigi

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Lids fit and trays are stackable for freezing - Ice do indeed pop out by pushing the silicone bottoms - Good price for quality and amount Cons: - Lids don't quite fit if overfilled and iced over, or after popping some ice out - Takes a bit to pop the ice out (brace both hands on sides) Overall, satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah W.

customer_reviews.title: Works As Advertised - See Updates
customer_reviews.text: I can’t complain. Once frozen, the ice cubes popped right out of this Adoric Life 3-Pack Easy Release Silicon Trays as advertised. Product very easy to use. Don’t just put water in them. Use juice, coffee or tea. Enough said! Update 05/17/2020: Having seen this down on cooking shows I’ve watched, these are perfect for flavored drink cubes, soup cubes or tomato paste cubes. When making chili I just pop out 1 cube of tomato paste!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Non-GMO Foodie Biker

customer_reviews.title: Don't twist them
customer_reviews.text: I had one tray left of the three, because they broke. We kept the last one from breaking by running the tray under warm water until the cubes are completely loose. The company sent us a replacement set. I'll update with any further advice if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. I hated my normal ice cube trays. The ice wouldn’t set right and I couldn’t get the ice out most of the time. I love these, you can just put a little pressure on the bottom if needed and the ice comes right out! Best thing I have purchased in awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberli Waggoner

customer_reviews.title: Not the best bang for your $$.
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind these are small and it takes a lot to make a significant amount of ice. The product is great and works as described but in order to make an adequate amount of ice you will need more than three. Consequently I purchased from another supplier who had 4 trays for a similar price.. I don't see a difference so why not go with a cheaper product that produces the same results.
customer_reviews.author: JDonna

customer_reviews.title: More trouble than it's worth...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because of the reviews, but honestly I was disappointed. You can't "crack" them like normal ice trays to release the ice. It takes both hands to get each cube out one by one by pushing on the bottom of each section. Also, the lid that come with them to make it spill resistant does not stay on at all. It doesn't even seem to fit. I ended up throwing these away and ordering the rubbermaid easy release trays which I absolutely love!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Deming

customer_reviews.title: Terrific ice cube trays
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after my husband bought 2 cheap trays that made tiny ice cubes. Our ice cube maker is not working thus the need for them. These are super. First they have a cover so I can get them from one place to the freezer without spilling; 2. they make large cubes and 3. they are easy to push out.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: NOT Leak Proof Lids!!!!
customer_reviews.text: In no way shape or form are the lids leak-proof as advertised. I was making coffee & cream cubes to put in White Russians for a cocktail party, and now I have the added fun of having to clean out the mess they made in my freezer, use care.
customer_reviews.author: Saralyn M

customer_reviews.title: The best i have used
customer_reviews.text: I really like these ice make, they have individual covers , so that I can stack them together to save more space and they will not stick together. Very easy to release the ice, wait about a minute when taking out from freeze, and press the back side of mold, they will come off easily .
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! The cubes are smaller than average, but very workable. I love this product. Leave them on counter for a couple minutes and they release fine. Great to have one cube pop out instead of all falling out onto counter. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: rflorez

customer_reviews.title: Great size cubes and easy release
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size cubes and easy to release the contents. We squeeze the juice from our lemons directly into the cubicles. Freeze it and then pop them out of the trays into freezer bags. We then have fresh lemon ice cubes for summer drinks or even recipes.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Noxon

customer_reviews.title: not great
customer_reviews.text: i ordered these to freeze baby food in and by the time its frozen its impossible to pop the food out. id imagine its the same with ice too. thought these would make life easier but definitely not the case :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value, nice quality for price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to freeze bulletproof coffee ingredients (butter/oils), and it works perfectly. Very easy to pop out frozen items. Both the top and bottom pieces have held up through multiple freezer and (top rack) dishwasher uses. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Wifey

customer_reviews.title: I will say things pop out fairly easily. Overall they work
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these to freeze things other than water and unfortunately the lids dont fit on well at all. Its definitely not air tight. I was hoping to be able to keep things fresh in the freezer. I will say things pop out fairly easily. Overall they work, they just could be better.
customer_reviews.author: LEMoore

customer_reviews.title: Great ice trays
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot easier to use than the old fashioned plastic ice trays, the silicone makes it very easy to get them out and the covers area nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: very fragile
customer_reviews.text: this thin plastic will break in half with the slightest twist. you aren't supposed to twist them, but inevitably you might exert too much pressure and these will break immediately. literal garbage.
customer_reviews.author: twinklefingers

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: Every summer, I make pesto and freeze it in ice cube trays so I can use small portions when needed. Every year, I've struggled to get the cubes out of the old, unyielding plastic ice cube trays. These trays are great! I just have to let them sit for a minute or two, and then it's so easy to pop them out. No more digging or melting and making a mess. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Contrary

customer_reviews.title: It's just OK
customer_reviews.text: Ice cubes are smaller than expected. But good quality and woks great. I wish I had bought 2 sets so I could have more cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Myanu

customer_reviews.title: Hardly any work to get the ice out, literally just a push of a button!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to pop the ice out! Great for weak hands or arthritis since you don’t have to twist the tray like the traditional kind. My daughter uses these in her college mini fridge and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Save you money
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t last more than a couple of uses. Two completely broke in half. And one is nearly split. Great idea but not good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie M Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, lasted 1.5 years and counting
customer_reviews.text: The material is pleasant to use and it's going strong after >18 months. No problems - no plastic taste, smell, or anything like that.
customer_reviews.author: Leo V

customer_reviews.title: Maybe The World's Best Ice Cube Trays?
customer_reviews.text: Who would have thought ice cube trays would be cool enough and good enough for me to spend time reviewing? These are awesome. In fact, one of my real life friends, seperate from me, ordered the same without speaking to me, and agreed with me that they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Rome

customer_reviews.title: Ice Cubes
customer_reviews.text: The fact that these come with a lid is perfect. I like that they stack and the ice cubes are super easy to remove. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: suzanne talbot

customer_reviews.title: Genius!
customer_reviews.text: These silicone-bottomed ice trays are genius. Love them. They are slightly smaller than regular ice cubes, so I need to use more of them, but otherwise, what a great invention. Unlike my old ice cub trays, the ice cubes come out easily and in one piece! They have lids so you can stack them before they're frozen.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Never have cubes stuck again
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. It takes a little getting used to because you don’t twist the tray like the old-fashioned trays, you push from the bottom. The silicone bottom makes them pop out with absolutely no effort. This product would be especially good for somebody with arthritis or carpal tunnel syndrome.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Good for single use- not for mass production
customer_reviews.text: I would like the cubes to be a bit bigger. I also read one review saying if you twist the tray all the ice cubes will fall out - this is not the case, for me at least. Works well, great value though. I’ve had them for a few weeks and they are standing the rest of time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ice Cube Trays
customer_reviews.text: Totally happy. When you buy all plastic ice cube trays, it is just a matter of time before they crack and become useless. The silicone bottom on these trays alleviates the need for twisting the tray to remove the cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Liz C

customer_reviews.title: High quality spill proof lids
customer_reviews.text: I receives these in the mail very quickly. They are high quality material. I love that they have spill proof lids. They work well. I have used them to make healthy freezer fudge and they are easy to push out. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy to remove the ice cubes as stated in the sales pitch. I wouldn't buy these again especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: No good.
customer_reviews.text: Hey there. Purchased these trays a few weeks back. Just tried the easy release press as suggested. No way. Ice wouldn’t budge. Ended up breaking the trays. Let last tray sit for five minutes and ice came out with aggressive pushing. No time for this. Wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Great ice trays
customer_reviews.text: Love these, will freeze your fingers pushing them out, but i put on ove-gloves, or kitchen towel and its a breeze. Highly recommend. Make sure you fill close to the top or your cubes will be very small.
customer_reviews.author: BSK

customer_reviews.title: Does not crack (so far)
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. Does not crack or break like conventional plastic ice trays 2. Compact and stackable. 3. The lids prevent spills and leakage Cons: Twisting the tray frame does not release all the ice cubes. I have to go and push up on the bottom of each one
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer in nc

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Great set of trays! I love that it has a lid, the silicone bottoms make it easy to pop the ice cubes out, and this is exactly what I wanted. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: This works as presented
customer_reviews.text: These ice mold are great. It's easy to get the ice out -- just turn it over and push on the silicone square. This is important to me because I have arthritis in my hands. I fill mine with a measuring cup, because this allows a lot of control over the filling process; the molds work best when filled to just below the edge. I did not rate durability because I don't yet know. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: str0nger

customer_reviews.title: Nice try
customer_reviews.text: Awesome idea. Like the cover to keep the ice fresh. But the ice is so hard to remove you could put your eye out when it finally has enough pressure to release.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy spigelmire

customer_reviews.title: Cubes are a little Smaller than average
customer_reviews.text: I like the look. Pretty easy to remove the ice. I like the cover to keep the smell out. Cover could be a little tighter. Cubes could be a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: Sallie Moore

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: The trays were much smaller than I anticipated but still work great. Lids fit a little loose but I’m guessing it’s designed like that for expansion as water freezes.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: It’s almost impossible to get ice out of this thing
customer_reviews.author: Domonique

customer_reviews.title: Not as simple as advertised, I don't regret it
customer_reviews.text: It's not quite as easy to remove the ice cubes as advertised, also the lids don't always snap on. And I'm never quite sure how full to fill these, but they sure are better than my broke ass 10 year old ones...
customer_reviews.author: Laurissa Meharry

customer_reviews.title: Hard to remove ice cubes
customer_reviews.text: Would not purchase again, too much work to get too little ice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the cover, wish it was easier to get ice out
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I got it because now I won’t break my next ice cube try, but still have to run hot water to get ice cubes out.
customer_reviews.author: Korrishaw

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: So after purchasing these I came across the exact same design in several different colors at the 99 cent store. Anyway one of these trays snapped in half making it useless as well as unable to return. I regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus Prime

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that it has lids! Certain cubes are more difficult to get out than others, but overall, I like the trays.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Best ice cube trays ever, love they have covers, makes it super easy to stack. Also the cubes pop right out and are a perfect size for water bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Stugelmeyer

customer_reviews.title: It's a snap to make ice cubes
customer_reviews.text: I like these ice trays but if you have any sort hand strength issues - you may have problems getting ice cubes loose. When removed from the freezer - it takes a lot of effort to release the cubes (by pressing on the bottom of the cube). Of course the usual thawing techniques work to reduce the effort.
customer_reviews.author: transom

customer_reviews.title: Very good trays!
customer_reviews.text: I like these ice trays. Easy to use. I have made coconut deserts and they pop right out with just a little force.
customer_reviews.author: MindTrue

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad
customer_reviews.text: Easy to remove the ice but if you need more than one cube you need to take the time to remove each one individually
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: While they are nice but they crack easily and it's hard to get ...
customer_reviews.text: While they are nice but they crack easily and it's hard to get the ice out without cracking the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Reid Megason

customer_reviews.title: Lids don’t stay closed
customer_reviews.text: Worst. Lids don’t stay closed at all. Do not use for baby food.
customer_reviews.author: Lenora Suki

customer_reviews.title: Durable but Pricey
customer_reviews.text: Gotta a wait a few minutes to get the cubes pushed out!
customer_reviews.author: Leon Milinis

customer_reviews.title: Good for a month
customer_reviews.text: Lasted one month until the return window was closed and then the plastic started to crack and break
customer_reviews.author: John Keston

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Works well, and is easier to use than other trays. A bit pricier, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Ice Pops
customer_reviews.text: I like them and they work great but they are smaller than I thought they would be.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not great
customer_reviews.text: Do not twist these like a regular ice cube tray or they will break. Overall the product is okay but not great.
customer_reviews.author: TJM

customer_reviews.title: Ice cubes one ... at ... a ... time.
customer_reviews.text: Silicone and covers are nice, but it’s an effort and slow to push out each cube one by one.
customer_reviews.author: DeJordy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The lids do not stay on but the cubes pop out when pushed from bottom
customer_reviews.author: STEPHANIE M TERRY

customer_reviews.title: That's a NO
customer_reviews.text: I bought these with the hope they would be easy to use (as in release the ice cubes easily). Not so and they are very small ice cubes when you do get them out. Don't bother with these
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S. DeNardo

customer_reviews.title: Great for keto diet "fat bombs"
customer_reviews.text: Great for keto diet fat bombs. The pack of three, all with lids, mean that I fill them up and store in the freezer. Then I easily pop out one or two cubes by pressing the flexible silicone bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Riddle

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great! I love the fact that they come with a lid.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Very small cubes
customer_reviews.text: Wasted $10 on this. Too small. Takes nearly the whole tray to fill my single ice needs. Read the fine print before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The lids make them east to stack and cram other ...
customer_reviews.text: The lids make them east to stack and cram other items around them in the tiny freezer of my mini fridge.
customer_reviews.author: jenrex

customer_reviews.title: Compact and stacks well
customer_reviews.text: Love that they are compact and stack in my freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Mega Evil Queen

customer_reviews.title: Too fussy - you would want either a good silicone tray or a good plastic tray, not this nonsense
customer_reviews.text: The silicone is too stiff once frozen to easily pop the ice out straight from the freezer. I ended up cracking the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Lb

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: These work, I can now get the ice cubes out easily as advertised. They are a little small as described so I might get some bigger ones as well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Richards

customer_reviews.title: They come with lids!!
customer_reviews.text: I love that these have lids! They don't fall into each other like my old I've cube trays have done. Easily removable and great for my smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Juelz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these trays. Cubes are easy to pop out!!! Dont think i would get any other kind now
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to pop out the ice cubes, my hisband raves about it! No plastic aftertaste seeps into the ice.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Lid doesn’t fit well
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 2 stars because they come with a lid that doesn’t stay on. You have to be carefull when stacking them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works if it doesn't come to you broken.
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept of how these work, but unfortunately one of the cubes in one tray came with a crack where the silicone meets the plastic. Otherwise, if it's not defective, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN M DUNHAM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made! Ice cubes are small, but I would buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: Merdy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were not good quality...one of the lids arrived cracked...disapppiinted!
customer_reviews.author: TLCarr

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the ice cube silicones had a hole in it
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Save money by freezing food instead of throwing it out!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to freeze herbs, tomato paste, coconut cream and much more!
customer_reviews.author: erin paul

customer_reviews.title: Best ice cube trays I’ve ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Just what we needed and at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: lids do not fit tight plus they broke
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept of silicone trays and have several different types... after eight months of using this model here is my experience... two of the trays have all ready cracked in the hard plastic areas... the lids never fit tightly so we constantly spilt water while transferring freshly filled tray into the freezer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews; but felt this POS was worth going 'out there' for. Don't buy; trays are very small, not easy to use as ice is hard to remove and there is only enuf ice per tray for one small glass. I choked when my local discount store had similar slicone ice tray for $.75 each. The $.75 discount store silicone tray versus the $4.00 tray offered here. No contest, save all your money; they are both not as good as the old standard American style plastic tray.
customer_reviews.author: Bosco Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Cracked.
customer_reviews.text: I just got these last week and really wanted to like them. I filled them and put them in the freezer, but when I went to use it, one of them had cracked down the center while freezing. Frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon b

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend as I'm sure more will fall out after more ...
customer_reviews.text: Neat concept but after maybe 5 uses the bottom silicone fell out of one of the trays. Would not recommend as I'm sure more will fall out after more use.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Byars

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to get out if filled to the top. Need to keep water level around the level of the silicone - meaning small ice cubes
customer_reviews.text: 4 / 5 stars as the ice cubes are very difficult to get out if they're too big. Best not filled to the brim, and not extending much beyond the level of the silicone. These can't be twisted to get them out, only pushed out from the bottom. Otherwise, good. And like that they have lids. Though not sure how long the lids will stay flat. They are already warped a little. And if they're warped, they don't stay closed and flush with the trays. Will update as I've only used them twice so far.
customer_reviews.author: NYC

customer_reviews.title: Lids don’t fit properly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because I hate spilling water when I fill my ice cube tray. Unfortunately the lids don’t match so it don’t close well and water still spills. However I will still give this product 4 stars because the ice popped right out. I didn’t have to struggle with twisting the tray like I did with my old ones. Just easily flip it over, push the silicon part and the ice cube pops out. No twisting needed!! Also with the lids (even though they don’t fit) I can stack the trays which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Hard Ice Ahead
customer_reviews.text: These trays are nice looking and the lids fit great. I have now used all three trays three times. The selling poiint for me was EASY REMOVAL of ice cubes. I expect I will eventually figure just what quantity of water will produce that result. I have not yet found it. Who would have thought that I would need directions to operate an ice cube tray!
customer_reviews.author: Minyon B.

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Cracked on First use.
customer_reviews.text: Poorly designed in my opinion. The lids in theory are a good idea but its hard to fill to the perfect fill line without some overflow when you put the lids on. Also you have to press real hard on the bottom of the silicone to get the cubes to pop out and when they do they pop fly all over the counter or on the floor. I tried the old fashion way of lightly twisting or bending the tray and the plastic cracked. If I wanted cheap crackable plastic I would have just gone to the 99cents.
customer_reviews.author: K Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Hate these.
customer_reviews.text: Makes ridiculously tiny ice cubes which melt very fast. Watery drinks in minutes. I didn't notice that the product description specified the trays make 14 cubes. My old trays make 12. The lids fit well and, because the trays are silicone, it's easy to remove individual ice cubes by pushing up from the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: bronwyn 8

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I needed some old fashioned ice cube trays for the refrigerator at work. I cannot believe how easy these are to use. I was used to struggling to get the cubes out. The middle ones were easy, but getting the last ones out meant almost twisitng the tray in two. Subsequently trays did not last long. The silicon bottom in these trays are amazing!! Just a simple push and out pops a whole ice cube. I definately recommend the trays.
customer_reviews.author: debkli

customer_reviews.title: Lid Doesn't Stay On
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to pop the cubes out of the tray once frozen. For that reason, I kept this. However, the lids for the trays never stay on thus rendering them useless. But if you're okay with uncovered ice trays, then these are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Great Concept and Highly Effective
customer_reviews.text: I love that these have lids! Not only do the lids help to keep "stuff" out of the water as it is freezing, but it also makes it easier to stack. What a concept! The construction of these -- the green silicone part makes it easier to pop the ice out (although not always) makes this a bonus. If I needed more I would certainly buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Joshuaone9

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Easy! Great trays.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! A slight twist, then press from the bottom and they pop right out. It’s great to enjoy ice again! One tray is perfect for 2 drinks. (7 cubes in each glass) They’re small so it takes more. But for 2 it’s great- just refill for tomorrow. I bought several sets and use for frozen lemonade, juices, fruit purée. They all come out of the trays easily.
customer_reviews.author: KKC-OR

customer_reviews.title: different, but...
customer_reviews.text: these are a break from the usual twisting and turning of a plastic tray. I'm not sure what the benefits are over any BPA free plastic tray because you must invest more time and energy to release the ice cubes from their pockets. popping them upwards can be difficult sometimes and definitely takes more time than twisting a plastic tray.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Just JUNK
customer_reviews.text: DON'T WORK. HARD TO HANDLE WITH WATER IN THEM. COVERS DON'T FIT TIGHT. WATER LEAKS OUT ALL OVER THE FREEZER. THEY ARE VERY MESSY. MAYBE MY MONEY RETURNED WOULD BE THE RIGHT THING TO DO.
customer_reviews.author: tom russo

customer_reviews.title: Happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I like how they have the silicone in the bottom for easier release. However being plastic topped, you must twist a little to crack apart. Which also makes it harder to release the cubes when stuck together. But can press from the bottom nicely to release.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: No more struggling
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Just like the title , it is easy to release the ice cubes from the tray. Furthermore, the trays came as expected . The color and physical qualities are true to picture. It's a simple purchase ... everyone needs ice cube trays. I highly recommend these ice cube trays they are durable, easy to clean, and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: April Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good, but small
customer_reviews.text: These work pretty well, but one tray shattered the first time we used it. I find that it works best if the tray is only filled 3/4 of the way, but the resulting cubes are pretty small.
customer_reviews.author: V.

customer_reviews.title: Ice pops out easy and can be stacked on top of one another
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to pop out the ice cubes from these trays. The lids that come with them are not a watertight fit, but they are sturdy enough to allow one to stack them one on top of another. I like to have a few of these as a backup in case the icemaker has to work double duty during the holiday gatherings.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge I Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: A work out to get to your ice
customer_reviews.text: Its damn near impossible to get the ice out. I have to seriously apply myself and then the damn ice cubes are too small. Very frustating.... Haven't had them for 2 months and the first tray is already broken.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: about the same
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I find I must run hot water over the back to get mine out so they are not an improvement over my old ones. The lid is nice to stack but it is not air tight so it really just sits on top of the tray. Nice color and sleek look.
customer_reviews.author: KC Shocker

product_meta.title: Adoric Life 3 Pack Easy Release Silicone Ice Cube Trays with Spill-Resistant Lids, 14 Shaped Cubes Each with Cover, Flexible Rubber Ice Molds for Whisky, Cocktail, Bourbon, LFGB Certified & BPA Free
product_meta.description:
Cool Your Drinks with Adoric Life Silicone Ice Cube Trays From Now On!
✔BPA Free
✔Food Grade Silicone
✔Dishwasher Safe
✔Smart Stacking
✔Multiple Uses

 Warm Prompts
1. Don't fill it up with water to prevent the ice from expanding and sticking the lid.
2. Take out the mold and rest it for 1-2 minutes, then you can easily get the ice cube out.
3. Temperature rang is -4℉-212℉, not applicable for oven and toaster.
4. It is normal that silicone products may have some odor when first using, you should remove smell according to following method.
5.Before making the ice cubes pop up easier, we advise put the trays in the normal temperature environment for a few minutes.

 Odor Remove Method
1. Clean it with cleanser first, and then dip it into hot water for 2 hours.
2. After cleaning, place it in ventilate place for 20 minutes. The odor will gradually disappear after using

 Package Content:
3 * Ice Cube Trays with Lids (Green + White)

 Specifications:
Ice Cube Size: 1.57x 1.18x 1.14 inch 
Ice Tray Size: 10.0x 3.86 x 1.06 inch (3.24oz)
Color: White + Green
feature_bullets: 【Premium Food-Grade Material】Adopted food-grade silicone and PP material, tested by LFGB in German, 100% BPA free. Enjoy your drinks without any worries.
【Convenience to Use】The hard pallet with PP material makes you fetch the water easily. Soft silicone bottom allows a quick release of the ice cubes by pushing up from the bottom.

【Spill - Resistance Lids】Keep your ice clean and free from freezer odors, easy to stack and save room in freezer. Prevent leaking in half seal degree(Not completely, or the trays may be hurt), help you make perfect shaped cubes.
【Diverse Functions】3 sets of ice cube trays with 42 ice cubes molds meet multiple ice-tray using occasions. Perfect molds for drinks freezing, snacks making and more. Add some fun to your drinks!
【12-Month Warranty】We offer 1 year full refund and replacement for your purchase. If you have any problems, please feel free to contact us.
